ygData.subject: a little info
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn;t have a gnome, so i decided to start one up on xegony to see if i can get the cash to try a few things, i had been thinking about adding a cork to the
ygData.messageBody:
I didn;t have a gnome, so i decided to start one up on xegony to see if
i can get the cash to try a few things, i had been thinking about
adding a cork to the shafts or rods, who knows maybe it needed
somehtign to stop it from collapsing too far. I had read about
salvadori, did a who all sal, and guess who was on, i asked him if he
was the guy making the poles, he said yes, i told him about my cork
idea, and he laughed and assured me a cork is not used. take that as
you will, i tried to get anymore info out of him, but was unable, only
found out his group is working on finding the ever elusive infra
goggles. also if gnomish fireworks are ever made, i would assume they
would cast some sort of dmg spell, maybe they;ve been replaced by those
generator or modulators, or whatever people were talkign about a few
weeks ago (I just read all the digest archives for fun tonight :P).
anyways thats my 0 cp, sinc ei got killed by a large rat and decided to
quit tinkering till tommorow.
